item.description:
I just checked the weather and can not let this day go by without a walk on the beach. Let's do a spur-of-the-moment walk at the Parker River Wild Life Refuge. I'll be in the parking lot at the Refuge Headquarter at 6 Plum Island Turnpike Newburyport, MA at 10:45am. I have a pass to the refuge and we can enter in one vehicle.

The Refuge headquarters is located just before the Plum Island Bridge, directly across the road from the Massachusetts Audubon building.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for my green Toyota 4runner with a Meetup sign on the dashboard.

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Let's Do A Walk On The Beach
